title: All Your Pretty Dreams
description: Jonny Knobel comes home to play in his family's polka band and to help his father repair the aging motel owned and run by his father. He's also trying to break away from his estranged wife and all the baggage of a failed marriage. While at home, he meets Isabel Yancy, a graduate student involved in a biology study of bees. They couldn't be more different in their ideals and dreams … you think …!!??
author: Lise McClendon
